description: This file defines a utility object 'SplitUtils' with functions to split a string into a LinkedList of tokens based on space delimiters. It includes helper functions to validate tokens before adding them to the list.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: A utility singleton object providing methods to split strings into linked list tokens.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits the input string into tokens separated by spaces and returns a LinkedList of these tokens.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds a token to the list if it passes the validation check.

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks whether the token is non-empty.
